item.description:
The Capitol Cinema Collective is putting the Open Screening Film Fest.  Think of it as Kareoke Night for film makers.    The evening starts with the musical group "String Theorie" w/a special guest. Films start at sundown (8:30 pm or so).  The whole event is outside at the Wadsworth Atheneum.  

The premier film is "The Dungeon Master".  This film won Best Short Film at the Tribeca Film Festival, this year in NYC.  There are at least 10 other films as of this date.  See what local and CT film majkers are doing with film and digital film making.

Cost is $9.00 for General Admmission, $5.00 for Wadsworth members.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet either in Avery Court (outside) or downstairs in the the Locktite Lobby (if its raining).

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: The Open Screening-Short Film fest
